questions.question: What part of the body is seriously affected by Malaria?
Which is most common type of Malaria and also most deadly?
How many types of Malaria infects humans?

information: Malaria is caused by a parasite called Plasmodium, which is transmitted via the bites of infected mosquitoes.
Most common symptom of Malaria is Liver damage and anemia, it also causes headache, fever, jaundice, Nausea and sweating
Symptoms of malaria include fever, headache, and vomiting, and usually appear between 10 and 15 days after the mosquito bite.
There are four types of common malaria parasites. Recently, a fifth type, Plasmodium knowlesi, has been causing malaria in Malaysia and areas of southeast Asia.
